org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.server.config

Class RestfulDiffuserServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.server.config.RestfulDiffuserServerConfig

  • public class RestfulDiffuserServerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration used by the RestfulDiffuserManagerResource so that it can supply newly created RestfulDiffusers with their diffuser strategy (end-points, weights, selection criteria, etc)
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Constructor and Description
      RestfulDiffuserServerConfig() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void configure(java.lang.String configFileName)
      Creates the list of end-points, the default strategy based on those end-points, the keyed diffuser strategy repository, and then sets the strategy in the repository.
      private static RestfulDiffuserServerConfigXml loadConfig(java.lang.String filename)
      Loads the configuration object from the XML file and returns it.
      private static DiffuserStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.Class<? extends DiffuserStrategyConfigXml> clazz)
      Loads the DiffuserStrategy from the specified file name and its associated XML configuration Class.

        private static final org.apache.log4j.Logger LOGGER

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestfulDiffuserServerConfig

        public RestfulDiffuserServerConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static final void configure(java.lang.String configFileName)
        Creates the list of end-points, the default strategy based on those end-points, the keyed diffuser strategy repository, and then sets the strategy in the repository.

      • loadConfig

        private static final RestfulDiffuserServerConfigXml loadConfig(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads the configuration object from the XML file and returns it. If the configuration file couldn't be read properly, then returns null.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the configuration file to read
        Returns:
        The configuration object or null if the configuration file can't be read properly

      • loadStrategy

        private static final DiffuserStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.Class<? extends DiffuserStrategyConfigXml> clazz)
        Loads the DiffuserStrategy from the specified file name and its associated XML configuration Class. Note that the XML configuration Class must have a generic argument that extends the DiffuserStrategyConfigXml class.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file containing the configuration information for creating the DiffuserStrategy.
        clazz - The Class into which the configuration information is loaded. Note that the class must extend the DiffuserStrategyConfigXml class.
        Returns:
        The loaded DiffuserStrategy
